sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">83202f38aa730210ecc902dfee2a3572</macroponent><name>Card click redirection for My requests</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        setState,
        emit
    } = api;

    const table = event.payload.table;
    const sysId = event.payload.sysId;
    const route = "record_request";

    if (table === "sc_req_item") {
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table,
                sysId
            }
        });
    } else if(table == "incident"){
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "incident",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
    else{
        emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
            route,
            fields: {
                table: "task",
                sysId
            }
        });
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-01 14:38:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>07202f38cd730210141c6b42531c7567</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Card click redirection for My requests</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Integrations" source="x_820501_integrate">c22f2bd52f26bd105250d39df699b6a8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Integrations">c22f2bd52f26bd105250d39df699b6a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_07202f38cd730210141c6b42531c7567</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-01 14:38:04</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
